text: Ahh I have heard that they push people lots around deadlines at MPC, but they do amazing work! The animation on the lion king was really amazing :grinning:
I hope you are doing well and staying safe with the pandemic at the moment, are you working from home at the moment?

Our uni course is paused but we all are still working on our showreels, hopefully when things are more normal we can apply for jobs :slightly_smiling_face: would it be ok for me to send some shots for you to have a look at? I completely understand if you are too busy at the moment
